page.title: 07A TYPICAL SOUTH LAKES FARM
page.content: farm,they are milk,cattle and lambs.Mr.Melling uses the auction marts at Kendal,Lancaster,Carlisle and Crewe.Aswell as selling his stock through the auction marts,he also exports a lot of his cattle all over the world,e.g.Russia,Saudia Araabia and France.The animals are fed on hay,silage,barley,brewers grain and also high-energy concentrate feeds.To help Mr.Melling with the work on the farm he employs one full-time worker.The soils on the farm are loam.Four main fertilisers are used,Nitro,Kaynitro,ICI No.2 and lime.Chemical sprays are also used,MCPA (for weeds in grassland) CMPP(for use on arable land).The machinery kept on the farm is as follows,grassland machinery,arable machinery,spreaders(fertilisers & manure).Contractors are used to help
